system.requirements:
Tier 3; Agility 40, Acrobatics Skill
Aptitudes; Weapon Skill. Fieldcraft, Slaanesh
system.effect: Once per Round, after a melee attack, may make a +0 Acrobatics Skill Test as a Free Action. Success allows character to immediately make a Free Half Action Move which does not provoke attack from opponent.

description.value: Once per Round, after a melee attack, may make a +0 Acrobatics Skill Test as a Free Action. Success allows character to immediately make a Free Half Action Move which does not provoke attack from opponent.
